author: etan_status
content:
EIPs updated:
1. https://eips.ethereum.org/EIPS/eip-7495 `StableContainer`
2. https://eips.ethereum.org/EIPS/eip-6493 SSZ `SignedTransaction`/`PooledTransaction`/`Receipt`
3. https://eips.ethereum.org/EIPS/eip-6404 `transactions_root`
4. https://eips.ethereum.org/EIPS/eip-6466 `receipts_root`
5. https://eips.ethereum.org/EIPS/eip-6465 `withdrawals_root`
Demo: https://eth-light.xyz (use Desktop browser, not mobile)

Vitalik's original writeup: https://notes.ethereum.org/@vbuterin/transaction_ssz_refactoring

Notably, the EIPs mainly touch on the "Undecided" parts of the writeup:
– Also move receipts to SSZ: yes
– Temporarily keep an MTP: no https://discord.com/channels/595666850260713488/779922457631916064/1119027814050582629
– Serialization/Merkleization: `StableContainer` - Validating JSON-RPC / ZK clients won't require periodic SW updates for unrelated changes (common fields: stable gindex)
– Eip2930 transaction support: yes
– Ban pre-SSZ transactions: no
